00016 inline void b3Project(__global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hull,  b3Float4ConstArg pos, b3QuatConstArg orn, 
00017 const b3Float4* dir, __global const b3Float4* vertices, float* min, float* max)
00018 {
00019         min[0] = FLT_MAX;
00020         max[0] = -FLT_MAX;
00021         int numVerts = hull->m_numVertices;
00022 
00023         const b3Float4 localDir = b3QuatRotate(b3QuatInverse(orn),*dir);
00024         float offset = b3Dot(pos,*dir);
00025         for(int i=0;i<numVerts;i++)
00026         {
00027                 float dp = b3Dot(vertices[hull->m_vertexOffset+i],localDir);
00028                 if(dp < min[0]) 
00029                         min[0] = dp;
00030                 if(dp > max[0]) 
00031                         max[0] = dp;
00032         }
00033         if(min[0]>max[0])
00034         {
00035                 float tmp = min[0];
00036                 min[0] = max[0];
00037                 max[0] = tmp;
00038         }
00039         min[0] += offset;
00040         max[0] += offset;
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 inline bool b3TestSepAxis(const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullA, __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullB, 
00045         b3Float4ConstArg posA,b3QuatConstArg ornA,
00046         b3Float4ConstArg posB,b3QuatConstArg ornB,
00047         b3Float4* sep_axis, const b3Float4* verticesA, __global const b3Float4* verticesB,float* depth)
00048 {
00049         float Min0,Max0;
00050         float Min1,Max1;
00051         b3Project(hullA,posA,ornA,sep_axis,verticesA, &Min0, &Max0);
00052         b3Project(hullB,posB,ornB, sep_axis,verticesB, &Min1, &Max1);
00053 
00054         if(Max0<Min1 || Max1<Min0)
00055                 return false;
00056 
00057         float d0 = Max0 - Min1;
00058         float d1 = Max1 - Min0;
00059         *depth = d0<d1 ? d0:d1;
00060         return true;
00061 }

00063 
00064 bool b3FindSeparatingAxis(      const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullA, __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullB, 
00065         b3Float4ConstArg posA1,
00066         b3QuatConstArg ornA,
00067         b3Float4ConstArg posB1,
00068         b3QuatConstArg ornB,
00069         b3Float4ConstArg DeltaC2,
00070         
00071         const b3Float4* verticesA, 
00072         const b3Float4* uniqueEdgesA, 
00073         const b3GpuFace* facesA,
00074         const int*  indicesA,
00075 
00076         __global const b3Float4* verticesB, 
00077         __global const b3Float4* uniqueEdgesB, 
00078         __global const b3GpuFace* facesB,
00079         __global const int*  indicesB,
00080         b3Float4* sep,
00081         float* dmin)
00082 {
00083         
00084 
00085         b3Float4 posA = posA1;
00086         posA.w = 0.f;
00087         b3Float4 posB = posB1;
00088         posB.w = 0.f;
00089 /*
00090         static int maxFaceVertex = 0;
00091 
00092         int curFaceVertexAB = hullA->m_numFaces*hullB->m_numVertices;
00093         curFaceVertexAB+= hullB->m_numFaces*hullA->m_numVertices;
00094 
00095         if (curFaceVertexAB>maxFaceVertex)
00096         {
00097                 maxFaceVertex = curFaceVertexAB;
00098                 printf("curFaceVertexAB = %d\n",curFaceVertexAB);
00099                 printf("hullA->m_numFaces = %d\n",hullA->m_numFaces);
00100                 printf("hullA->m_numVertices = %d\n",hullA->m_numVertices);
00101                 printf("hullB->m_numVertices = %d\n",hullB->m_numVertices);
00102         }
00103 */
00104 
00105         int curPlaneTests=0;
00106         {
00107                 int numFacesA = hullA->m_numFaces;
00108                 // Test normals from hullA
00109                 for(int i=0;i<numFacesA;i++)
00110                 {
00111                         const b3Float4 normal = facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+i].m_plane;
00112                         b3Float4 faceANormalWS = b3QuatRotate(ornA,normal);
00113                         if (b3Dot(DeltaC2,faceANormalWS)<0)
00114                                 faceANormalWS*=-1.f;
00115                         curPlaneTests++;
00116                         float d;
00117                         if(!b3TestSepAxis( hullA, hullB, posA,ornA,posB,ornB,&faceANormalWS, verticesA, verticesB,&d))
00118                                 return false;
00119                         if(d<*dmin)
00120                         {
00121                                 *dmin = d;
00122                                 *sep = faceANormalWS;
00123                         }
00124                 }
00125         }
00126         if((b3Dot(-DeltaC2,*sep))>0.0f)
00127         {
00128                 *sep = -(*sep);
00129         }
00130         return true;
00131 }

00301 bool b3FindSeparatingAxisEdgeEdge(      const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullA, __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* hullB, 
00302         b3Float4ConstArg posA1,
00303         b3QuatConstArg ornA,
00304         b3Float4ConstArg posB1,
00305         b3QuatConstArg ornB,
00306         b3Float4ConstArg DeltaC2,
00307         const b3Float4* verticesA, 
00308         const b3Float4* uniqueEdgesA, 
00309         const b3GpuFace* facesA,
00310         const int*  indicesA,
00311         __global const b3Float4* verticesB, 
00312         __global const b3Float4* uniqueEdgesB, 
00313         __global const b3GpuFace* facesB,
00314         __global const int*  indicesB,
00315                 b3Float4* sep,
00316         float* dmin,
00317         bool searchAllEdgeEdge)
00318 {
00319 
00320 
00321         b3Float4 posA = posA1;
00322         posA.w = 0.f;
00323         b3Float4 posB = posB1;
00324         posB.w = 0.f;
00325 
00326 //      int curPlaneTests=0;
00327 
00328         int curEdgeEdge = 0;
00329         // Test edges
00330         static int maxEdgeTests = 0;
00331         int curEdgeTests = hullA->m_numUniqueEdges * hullB->m_numUniqueEdges;
00332         if (curEdgeTests >maxEdgeTests )
00333         {
00334                 maxEdgeTests  = curEdgeTests ;
00335                 printf("maxEdgeTests = %d\n",maxEdgeTests );
00336                 printf("hullA->m_numUniqueEdges = %d\n",hullA->m_numUniqueEdges);
00337                 printf("hullB->m_numUniqueEdges = %d\n",hullB->m_numUniqueEdges);
00338 
00339         }
00340 
00341         
00342         if (searchAllEdgeEdge)
00343         {
00344                 for(int e0=0;e0<hullA->m_numUniqueEdges;e0++)
00345                 {
00346                         const b3Float4 edge0 = uniqueEdgesA[hullA->m_uniqueEdgesOffset+e0];
00347                         b3Float4 edge0World = b3QuatRotate(ornA,edge0);
00348 
00349                         for(int e1=0;e1<hullB->m_numUniqueEdges;e1++)
00350                         {
00351                                 const b3Float4 edge1 = uniqueEdgesB[hullB->m_uniqueEdgesOffset+e1];
00352                                 b3Float4 edge1World = b3QuatRotate(ornB,edge1);
00353 
00354 
00355                                 b3Float4 crossje = b3Cross(edge0World,edge1World);
00356 
00357                                 curEdgeEdge++;
00358                                 if(!b3IsAlmostZero(crossje))
00359                                 {
00360                                         crossje = b3Normalized(crossje);
00361                                         if (b3Dot(DeltaC2,crossje)<0)
00362                                                 crossje *= -1.f;
00363 
00364                                         float dist;
00365                                         bool result = true;
00366                                         {
00367                                                 float Min0,Max0;
00368                                                 float Min1,Max1;
00369                                                 b3Project(hullA,posA,ornA,&crossje,verticesA, &Min0, &Max0);
00370                                                 b3Project(hullB,posB,ornB,&crossje,verticesB, &Min1, &Max1);
00371                                 
00372                                                 if(Max0<Min1 || Max1<Min0)
00373                                                         return false;
00374                     
00375                                                 float d0 = Max0 - Min1;
00376                                                 float d1 = Max1 - Min0;
00377                                                 dist = d0<d1 ? d0:d1;
00378                                                 result = true;
00379 
00380                                         }
00381                                 
00382 
00383                                         if(dist<*dmin)
00384                                         {
00385                                                 *dmin = dist;
00386                                                 *sep = crossje;
00387                                         }
00388                                 }
00389                         }
00390 
00391                 }
00392         } else
00393         {
00394                 int numDirections = sizeof(unitSphere162)/sizeof(b3Vector3);
00395                 //printf("numDirections =%d\n",numDirections );
00396 
00397 
00398                 for(int i=0;i<numDirections;i++)
00399                 {
00400                         b3Float4 crossje = unitSphere162[i];
00401                         {
00402                                 //if (b3Dot(DeltaC2,crossje)>0)
00403                                 {
00404                                         float dist;
00405                                         bool result = true;
00406                                         {
00407                                                 float Min0,Max0;
00408                                                 float Min1,Max1;
00409                                                 b3Project(hullA,posA,ornA,&crossje,verticesA, &Min0, &Max0);
00410                                                 b3Project(hullB,posB,ornB,&crossje,verticesB, &Min1, &Max1);
00411                                 
00412                                                 if(Max0<Min1 || Max1<Min0)
00413                                                         return false;
00414                     
00415                                                 float d0 = Max0 - Min1;
00416                                                 float d1 = Max1 - Min0;
00417                                                 dist = d0<d1 ? d0:d1;
00418                                                 result = true;
00419 
00420                                         }
00421                                 
00422 
00423                                         if(dist<*dmin)
00424                                         {
00425                                                 *dmin = dist;
00426                                                 *sep = crossje;
00427                                         }
00428                                 }
00429                         }
00430                 }
00431 
00432         }
00433 
00434         
00435         if((b3Dot(-DeltaC2,*sep))>0.0f)
00436         {
00437                 *sep = -(*sep);
00438         }
00439         return true;
00440 }

00442 
00443 
00444 inline int      b3FindClippingFaces(b3Float4ConstArg separatingNormal,
00445                       __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t* hullA, __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData_t* hullB,
00446                       b3Float4ConstArg posA, b3QuatConstArg ornA,b3Float4ConstArg posB, b3QuatConstArg ornB,
00447                        __global b3Float4* worldVertsA1,
00448                       __global b3Float4* worldNormalsA1,
00449                       __global b3Float4* worldVertsB1,
00450                       int capacityWorldVerts,
00451                       const float minDist, float maxDist,
00452                       __global const b3Float4* verticesA,
00453                       __global const b3GpuFace_t* facesA,
00454                       __global const int* indicesA,
00455                                                 __global const b3Float4* verticesB,
00456                       __global const b3GpuFace_t* facesB,
00457                       __global const int* indicesB,
00458 
00459                       __global b3Int4* clippingFaces, int pairIndex)
00460 {
00461         int numContactsOut = 0;
00462         int numWorldVertsB1= 0;
00463     
00464     
00465         int closestFaceB=-1;
00466         float dmax = -FLT_MAX;
00467     
00468         {
00469                 for(int face=0;face<hullB->m_numFaces;face++)
00470                 {
00471                         const b3Float4 Normal = b3MakeFloat4(facesB[hullB->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.x,
00472                                               facesB[hullB->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.y, facesB[hullB->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.z,0.f);
00473                         const b3Float4 WorldNormal = b3QuatRotate(ornB, Normal);
00474                         float d = b3Dot(WorldNormal,separatingNormal);
00475                         if (d > dmax)
00476                         {
00477                                 dmax = d;
00478                                 closestFaceB = face;
00479                         }
00480                 }
00481         }
00482     
00483         {
00484                 const b3GpuFace_t polyB = facesB[hullB->m_faceOffset+closestFaceB];
00485                 const int numVertices = polyB.m_numIndices;
00486                 for(int e0=0;e0<numVertices;e0++)
00487                 {
00488                         const b3Float4 b = verticesB[hullB->m_vertexOffset+indicesB[polyB.m_indexOffset+e0]];
00489                         worldVertsB1[pairIndex*capacityWorldVerts+numWorldVertsB1++] = b3TransformPoint(b,posB,ornB);
00490                 }
00491         }
00492     
00493     int closestFaceA=-1;
00494         {
00495                 float dmin = FLT_MAX;
00496                 for(int face=0;face<hullA->m_numFaces;face++)
00497                 {
00498                         const b3Float4 Normal = b3MakeFloat4(
00499                                               facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.x,
00500                                               facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.y,
00501                                               facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+face].m_plane.z,
00502                                               0.f);
00503                         const b3Float4 faceANormalWS = b3QuatRotate(ornA,Normal);
00504             
00505                         float d = b3Dot(faceANormalWS,separatingNormal);
00506                         if (d < dmin)
00507                         {
00508                                 dmin = d;
00509                                 closestFaceA = face;
00510                 worldNormalsA1[pairIndex] = faceANormalWS;
00511                         }
00512                 }
00513         }
00514     
00515     int numVerticesA = facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+closestFaceA].m_numIndices;
00516         for(int e0=0;e0<numVerticesA;e0++)
00517         {
00518         const b3Float4 a = verticesA[hullA->m_vertexOffset+indicesA[facesA[hullA->m_faceOffset+closestFaceA].m_indexOffset+e0]];
00519         worldVertsA1[pairIndex*capacityWorldVerts+e0] = b3TransformPoint(a, posA,ornA);
00520     }
00521     
00522     clippingFaces[pairIndex].x = closestFaceA;
00523     clippingFaces[pairIndex].y = closestFaceB;
00524     clippingFaces[pairIndex].z = numVerticesA;
00525     clippingFaces[pairIndex].w = numWorldVertsB1;
00526     
00527     
00528         return numContactsOut;
00529 }
00530 
00531 
00532         
00533 
00534 __kernel void   b3FindConcaveSeparatingAxisKernel( __global b3Int4* concavePairs,
00535                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3RigidBodyData* rigidBodies,
00536                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3Collidable* collidables,
00537                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3ConvexPolyhedronData* convexShapes, 
00538                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3Float4* vertices,
00539                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3Float4* uniqueEdges,
00540                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3GpuFace* faces,
00541                                                                                                                                                                         __global const int* indices,
00542                                                                                                                                                                         __global const b3GpuChildShape* gpuChildShapes,
00543                                                                                                                                                                         __global b3Aabb* aabbs,
00544                                                                                                                                                                         __global b3Float4* concaveSeparatingNormalsOut,
00545                                                                                                                                                                         __global b3Int4* clippingFacesOut,
00546                                                                                                                                                                         __global b3Vector3* worldVertsA1Out,
00547                                                                                                                                                                         __global b3Vector3* worldNormalsA1Out,
00548                                                                                                                                                                         __global b3Vector3* worldVertsB1Out,
00549                                                                                                                                                                         __global int* hasSeparatingNormals,
00550                                                                                                                                                                         int vertexFaceCapacity,
00551                                                                                                                                                                         int numConcavePairs,
00552                                                                                                                                                                         int pairIdx
00553                                                                                                                                                                         )
00554 {
00555         int i = pairIdx;
00556 /*      int i = get_global_id(0);
00557         if (i>=numConcavePairs)
00558                 return;
00559         int pairIdx = i;
00560         */
00561 
00562         int bodyIndexA = concavePairs[i].x;
00563         int bodyIndexB = concavePairs[i].y;
00564 
00565         int collidableIndexA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_collidableIdx;
00566         int collidableIndexB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_collidableIdx;
00567 
00568         int shapeIndexA = collidables[collidableIndexA].m_shapeIndex;
00569         int shapeIndexB = collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
00570 
00571         if (collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType!=SHAPE_CONVEX_HULL&&
00572                 collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType!=SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS)
00573         {
00574                 concavePairs[pairIdx].w = -1;
00575                 return;
00576         }
00577 
00578         hasSeparatingNormals[i] = 0;
00579 
00580 //      int numFacesA = convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_numFaces;
00581         int numActualConcaveConvexTests = 0;
00582         
00583         int f = concavePairs[i].z;
00584         
00585         bool overlap = false;
00586         
00587         b3ConvexPolyhedronData convexPolyhedronA;
00588 
00589         //add 3 vertices of the triangle
00590         convexPolyhedronA.m_numVertices = 3;
00591         convexPolyhedronA.m_vertexOffset = 0;
00592         b3Float4        localCenter = b3MakeFloat4(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f);
00593 
00594         b3GpuFace face = faces[convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_faceOffset+f];
00595         b3Aabb triAabb;
00596         triAabb.m_minVec = b3MakeFloat4(1e30f,1e30f,1e30f,0.f);
00597         triAabb.m_maxVec = b3MakeFloat4(-1e30f,-1e30f,-1e30f,0.f);
00598         
00599         b3Float4 verticesA[3];
00600         for (int i=0;i<3;i++)
00601         {
00602                 int index = indices[face.m_indexOffset+i];
00603                 b3Float4 vert = vertices[convexShapes[shapeIndexA].m_vertexOffset+index];
00604                 verticesA[i] = vert;
00605                 localCenter += vert;
00606                         
00607                 triAabb.m_minVec = b3MinFloat4(triAabb.m_minVec,vert);          
00608                 triAabb.m_maxVec = b3MaxFloat4(triAabb.m_maxVec,vert);          
00609 
00610         }
00611 
00612         overlap = true;
00613         overlap = (triAabb.m_minVec.x > aabbs[bodyIndexB].m_maxVec.x || triAabb.m_maxVec.x < aabbs[bodyIndexB].m_minVec.x) ? false : overlap;
00614         overlap = (triAabb.m_minVec.z > aabbs[bodyIndexB].m_maxVec.z || triAabb.m_maxVec.z < aabbs[bodyIndexB].m_minVec.z) ? false : overlap;
00615         overlap = (triAabb.m_minVec.y > aabbs[bodyIndexB].m_maxVec.y || triAabb.m_maxVec.y < aabbs[bodyIndexB].m_minVec.y) ? false : overlap;
00616                 
00617         if (overlap)
00618         {
00619                 float dmin = FLT_MAX;
00620                 int hasSeparatingAxis=5;
00621                 b3Float4 sepAxis=b3MakeFloat4(1,2,3,4);
00622 
00623         //      int localCC=0;
00624                 numActualConcaveConvexTests++;
00625 
00626                 //a triangle has 3 unique edges
00627                 convexPolyhedronA.m_numUniqueEdges = 3;
00628                 convexPolyhedronA.m_uniqueEdgesOffset = 0;
00629                 b3Float4 uniqueEdgesA[3];
00630                 
00631                 uniqueEdgesA[0] = (verticesA[1]-verticesA[0]);
00632                 uniqueEdgesA[1] = (verticesA[2]-verticesA[1]);
00633                 uniqueEdgesA[2] = (verticesA[0]-verticesA[2]);
00634 
00635 
00636                 convexPolyhedronA.m_faceOffset = 0;
00637                                   
00638                 b3Float4 normal = b3MakeFloat4(face.m_plane.x,face.m_plane.y,face.m_plane.z,0.f);
00639                              
00640                 b3GpuFace facesA[B3_TRIANGLE_NUM_CONVEX_FACES];
00641                 int indicesA[3+3+2+2+2];
00642                 int curUsedIndices=0;
00643                 int fidx=0;
00644 
00645                 //front size of triangle
00646                 {
00647                         facesA[fidx].m_indexOffset=curUsedIndices;
00648                         indicesA[0] = 0;
00649                         indicesA[1] = 1;
00650                         indicesA[2] = 2;
00651                         curUsedIndices+=3;
00652                         float c = face.m_plane.w;
00653                         facesA[fidx].m_plane.x = normal.x;
00654                         facesA[fidx].m_plane.y = normal.y;
00655                         facesA[fidx].m_plane.z = normal.z;
00656                         facesA[fidx].m_plane.w = c;
00657                         facesA[fidx].m_numIndices=3;
00658                 }
00659                 fidx++;
00660                 //back size of triangle
00661                 {
00662                         facesA[fidx].m_indexOffset=curUsedIndices;
00663                         indicesA[3]=2;
00664                         indicesA[4]=1;
00665                         indicesA[5]=0;
00666                         curUsedIndices+=3;
00667                         float c = b3Dot(normal,verticesA[0]);
00668                 //      float c1 = -face.m_plane.w;
00669                         facesA[fidx].m_plane.x = -normal.x;
00670                         facesA[fidx].m_plane.y = -normal.y;
00671                         facesA[fidx].m_plane.z = -normal.z;
00672                         facesA[fidx].m_plane.w = c;
00673                         facesA[fidx].m_numIndices=3;
00674                 }
00675                 fidx++;
00676 
00677                 bool addEdgePlanes = true;
00678                 if (addEdgePlanes)
00679                 {
00680                         int numVertices=3;
00681                         int prevVertex = numVertices-1;
00682                         for (int i=0;i<numVertices;i++)
00683                         {
00684                                 b3Float4 v0 = verticesA[i];
00685                                 b3Float4 v1 = verticesA[prevVertex];
00686                                             
00687                                 b3Float4 edgeNormal = b3Normalized(b3Cross(normal,v1-v0));
00688                                 float c = -b3Dot(edgeNormal,v0);
00689 
00690                                 facesA[fidx].m_numIndices = 2;
00691                                 facesA[fidx].m_indexOffset=curUsedIndices;
00692                                 indicesA[curUsedIndices++]=i;
00693                                 indicesA[curUsedIndices++]=prevVertex;
00694                                             
00695                                 facesA[fidx].m_plane.x = edgeNormal.x;
00696                                 facesA[fidx].m_plane.y = edgeNormal.y;
00697                                 facesA[fidx].m_plane.z = edgeNormal.z;
00698                                 facesA[fidx].m_plane.w = c;
00699                                 fidx++;
00700                                 prevVertex = i;
00701                         }
00702                 }
00703                 convexPolyhedronA.m_numFaces = B3_TRIANGLE_NUM_CONVEX_FACES;
00704                 convexPolyhedronA.m_localCenter = localCenter*(1.f/3.f);
00705 
00706 
00707                 b3Float4 posA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_pos;
00708                 posA.w = 0.f;
00709                 b3Float4 posB = rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_pos;
00710                 posB.w = 0.f;
00711 
00712                 b3Quaternion ornA = rigidBodies[bodyIndexA].m_quat;
00713                 b3Quaternion ornB =rigidBodies[bodyIndexB].m_quat;
00714 
00715                 
00716 
00717 
00720 
00721                 if (collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeType==SHAPE_COMPOUND_OF_CONVEX_HULLS)
00722                 {
00723                         int compoundChild = concavePairs[pairIdx].w;
00724                         int childShapeIndexB = compoundChild;//collidables[collidableIndexB].m_shapeIndex+compoundChild;
00725                         int childColIndexB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
00726                         b3Float4 childPosB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childPosition;
00727                         b3Quaternion childOrnB = gpuChildShapes[childShapeIndexB].m_childOrientation;
00728                         b3Float4 newPosB = b3TransformPoint(childPosB,posB,ornB);
00729                         b3Quaternion newOrnB = b3QuatMul(ornB,childOrnB);
00730                         posB = newPosB;
00731                         ornB = newOrnB;
00732                         shapeIndexB = collidables[childColIndexB].m_shapeIndex;
00733                 }
00735 
00736                 b3Float4 c0local = convexPolyhedronA.m_localCenter;
00737                 b3Float4 c0 = b3TransformPoint(c0local, posA, ornA);
00738                 b3Float4 c1local = convexShapes[shapeIndexB].m_localCenter;
00739                 b3Float4 c1 = b3TransformPoint(c1local,posB,ornB);
00740                 const b3Float4 DeltaC2 = c0 - c1;
00741 
00742 
00743                 bool sepA = b3FindSeparatingAxis(       &convexPolyhedronA, &convexShapes[shapeIndexB],
00744                                                                                                 posA,ornA,
00745                                                                                                 posB,ornB,
00746                                                                                                 DeltaC2,
00747                                                                                                 verticesA,uniqueEdgesA,facesA,indicesA,
00748                                                                                                 vertices,uniqueEdges,faces,indices,
00749                                                                                                 &sepAxis,&dmin);
00750                 hasSeparatingAxis = 4;
00751                 if (!sepA)
00752                 {
00753                         hasSeparatingAxis = 0;
00754                 } else
00755                 {
00756                         bool sepB = b3FindSeparatingAxis(       &convexShapes[shapeIndexB],&convexPolyhedronA,
00757                                                                                                 posB,ornB,
00758                                                                                                 posA,ornA,
00759                                                                                                 DeltaC2,
00760                                                                                                 vertices,uniqueEdges,faces,indices,
00761                                                                                                 verticesA,uniqueEdgesA,facesA,indicesA,
00762                                                                                                 &sepAxis,&dmin);
00763 
00764                         if (!sepB)
00765                         {
00766                                 hasSeparatingAxis = 0;
00767                         } else
00768                         {
00769                                 bool sepEE = b3FindSeparatingAxisEdgeEdge(      &convexPolyhedronA, &convexShapes[shapeIndexB],
00770                                                                                                                         posA,ornA,
00771                                                                                                                         posB,ornB,
00772                                                                                                                         DeltaC2,
00773                                                                                                                         verticesA,uniqueEdgesA,facesA,indicesA,
00774                                                                                                                         vertices,uniqueEdges,faces,indices,
00775                                                                                                                         &sepAxis,&dmin,true);
00776         
00777                                 if (!sepEE)
00778                                 {
00779                                         hasSeparatingAxis = 0;
00780                                 } else
00781                                 {
00782                                         hasSeparatingAxis = 1;
00783                                 }
00784                         }
00785                 }       
00786                 
00787                 if (hasSeparatingAxis)
00788                 {
00789                         hasSeparatingNormals[i]=1;
00790                         sepAxis.w = dmin;
00791                         concaveSeparatingNormalsOut[pairIdx]=sepAxis;
00792 
00793                         //now compute clipping faces A and B, and world-space clipping vertices A and B...
00794 
00795                         float minDist = -1e30f;
00796                         float maxDist = 0.02f;
00797 
00798                         b3FindClippingFaces(sepAxis,
00799                      &convexPolyhedronA,
00800                                          &convexShapes[shapeIndexB],
00801                                          posA,ornA,
00802                                          posB,ornB,
00803                        worldVertsA1Out,
00804                       worldNormalsA1Out,
00805                       worldVertsB1Out,
00806                                           vertexFaceCapacity,
00807                       minDist, maxDist,
00808                       verticesA,
00809                       facesA,
00810                       indicesA,
00811  
00812                                           vertices,
00813                       faces,
00814                       indices,
00815                       clippingFacesOut, pairIdx);
00816 
00817                 } else
00818                 {       
00819                         //mark this pair as in-active
00820                         concavePairs[pairIdx].w = -1;
00821                 }
00822         }
00823         else
00824         {       
00825                 //mark this pair as in-active
00826                 concavePairs[pairIdx].w = -1;
00827         }
00828 }
